children.text: When that happens, there will be very few unmarried men.
So seven unmarried women will grab one man and say,
We will provide our own food and clothing.
All that we want is to no longer be disgraced because of not being married."
But some day, Israel will be very beautiful and great.
All the people who will remain in Jerusalem, who did not die when the enemy destroyed Jerusalem,
That will happen when the Lord washes away the guilt of the women of Jerusalem,
Then Yahweh will send a cloud of smoke during the days and a flaming fire during the nights
It will shelter the people from the sun during the daytime
